resources.string: Welcome! This is Blendle by Pieter Otten
Now make sure that Daydream is enabled and the Blendle Daydream is selected
This Blendle app has a Daydream function. This is a screensaver which shows the popular items of today when your device is docked or charging.\n\nWould you like to try out the Blendle Daydream?
We\'ve detected that you\'ve enabled Daydream but have not selected the Blendle Daydream. Would you like to change that?
Could not find the Daydream settings page. Please find the settings in your default settings menu.
